    • studentModuleLVSort

      public boolean studentModuleLVSort(javafx.scene.view_control.ListView _lv, int studentIndex, boolean sortMode)

      Student Module LV Sort

      sorts the student module list view, either by name or by grade
      Parameters:
      _lv - - The listView to be sorted
      studentIndex - - the index of the student in the student database.
      sortMode - - If true, modules will be sorted by grade. Otherwise, modules will be sorted by name.
